nodes.text: The twin ion engine was a type of ion sublight drive used in starships.
The twin ion engine was an ion engine which propelled starships in space. This sublight drive was widely incorporated into various models of starfighters.
The engine was used in Kuat Systems Engineering's Eta-2 Actis-class light interceptor, as well as Sienar Fleet Systems' TIE line.

The TIE/sk x1 experimental air superiority fighter, also known as the TIE Striker, was a model of the TIE line in service to the Galactic Empire. This atmospheric fighter's twin ion engine emmitted a blue light.
As twin ion engines appear every time a TIE fighter does, this list contains only specific mentions of twin ion engines.
